Added variable plot data

Source: R/ols-plots-data.R
ols_prep_avplot_data.Rd

Data for generating the added variable plots.

ols_prep_avplot_data(model)

Arguments

model

An object of class lm.

Examples

model <- lm(mpg ~ disp + hp + wt, data = mtcars)
ols_prep_avplot_data(model)
#> # A tibble: 32 x 4
#>      mpg  disp    hp    wt
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1  21    160    110  2.62
#>  2  21    160    110  2.88
#>  3  22.8  108     93  2.32
#>  4  21.4  258    110  3.22
#>  5  18.7  360    175  3.44
#>  6  18.1  225    105  3.46
#>  7  14.3  360    245  3.57
#>  8  24.4  147.    62  3.19
#>  9  22.8  141.    95  3.15
#> 10  19.2  168.   123  3.44
#> # ... with 22 more rows
